text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Santa Ynez |other_name = |native_name = |nickname = |settlement_type = census-designated place |motto = |image_skyline = Santa Ynez.jpg |imagesize = |image_caption = A boutique with western-style architectural details |image_flag = |image_seal = |image_shield = |image_blank_emblem = |blank_emblem_type = |image_map = Santa Barbara County California Incorporated and Unincorporated areas Santa Ynez Highlighted 0670182.svg |mapsize = 250x200px |map_caption = Location in Santa Barbara County and the state of California |pushpin_map = California#USA |pushpin_map_caption = Location in California##Location in the United States |pushpin_label_position = |pushpin_mapsize = |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = |subdivision_type1 = State |subdivision_name1 = |subdivision_type2 = County |subdivision_name2 = Santa Barbara |subdivision_type3 = |subdivision_name3 = |government_footnotes = |government_type = |established_title = |established_date = | unit_pref = US | area_footnotes = | area_total_sq_mi = 4.837 | area_land_sq_mi = 4.830 | area_water_sq_mi = 0.007 | area_total_km2 = 12.53 | area_land_km2 = 12.51 | area_water_km2 = 0.02 | area_water_percent = 0.14 | area_note = |population_as_of = 2020 |population_footnotes = |population_note = |population_total = 4505 |population_density_km2 = auto |population_density_sq_mi = auto |timezone = PST |utc_offset = -8 |timezone_DST = PDT |utc_offset_DST = -7 |coordinates = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = 185 |elevation_ft = 607 |postal_code_type = ZIP code |postal_code = 93460 |area_code = 805 |blank_name = FIPS code |blank_info = 06-70182 |blank1_name = GNIS feature ID |blank1_info = 1661407 |website = |footnotes = }} Santa Ynez is a census-designated place (CDP) in the Santa Ynez Valley of Santa Barbara County, California. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in California Category:Settlements in Santa Barbara County, California
